action.description: The committee on TRN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 4 Ayes: Representative(s) Kila, Grandinetti, Evslin, Miyake; Ayes with reservations: none; 2 Noes: Representative(s) Muraoka, Pierick; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Cochran, Kitagawa, La Chica.
